duties_responsibilities.duty: Lead strategic financial planning and analysis function with a focus on operational and analytical reporting, budget and rolling forecast cycles, and monthly financial accounting.
Partner with EVPs, Show Directors, and their teams to provide financial insights and support cost management at the brand and show level.
Proactively identify and promote best practices through analytics and KPIs, accurately budgeting and forecasting expectations for each business line.
Consolidate actual performance results, prepare variance analysis, and liaise with the Accounting organization to ensure accurate financial results are recorded.
Lead financial analyses of target M&A transactions and integrations relating to the area of responsibility.

education_certification.credential: BS/BA in Finance/Accounting; MBA is a plus
